properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS 12 THRU 21 JAN
   BY M/V POLARCUS NAILA TOWING 12 7000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-58.5S 039-41.5W, 22-00.3S 039-37.5W,
   22-41.8S 039-54.4W, 22-40.1S 039-58.5W,
   22-23.8S 040-22.3W, 22-08.1S 040-13.4W,
   22-11.4S 040-07.3W, 22-06.1S 039-48.8W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 35/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 JAN 21.
